summary: Add a adept spell to summon True Tribunal Azura, Boethiah, and Mephala to tamriel for 60 second base of conjuration skill [Required HDT].
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][u][b]The True Tribunal Summoning Spells[/b][/u]

Add a expert spell to summon "True Tribunal"
Azura, Boethiah, and Mephala to tamriel for 60 second
base of conjuration skill [Required HDT].

Update 1.3
Completely new spell that fix the previous version
Now all spell can be buy from falion in morthal

Issue:
Â If there is a problem try to uninstall previous version start the game Save then install the newer version,
then buy the new spells from falion in morthal.
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]
Name: Azura, Boethiah, & Mephala
Combat Style: Daedra Melee 1h & Mage
Weapon : Goldbrand
Body : -CBBE-
Armor : Custom Daedric

[b]Location :[/b]
[Whiterun Dragonsreach]

Required :
Skyrim.esm

[b][u]> > Required for HDT < <[/u][/b]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][size=3]Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?][size=3]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?][size=3]HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b][/size][/url]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[size=3][b]Installation : [/b]
NMM or copy to data folder
[b]Uninstall : [/b]
Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Credit : [/b]
BETHESDA
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?][size=3]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente[/b][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015][size=3]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by [b]Caliente[/b][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986][size=3]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2[/size][/url]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32329][size=3]Battle Hardened Body Mod Vanilla UNP UNPB UNPC CBBE ADEC by [b]Wast1980[/b][/size][/url][size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15431][size=3]Insanitys Goldbrand by [b]InsanitySorrow[/b][/size][/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797][size=3]Ponytail Hairstyles v3_0 by [b]Azar[/b][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259][size=3]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT by [b]ChronoTrigger77[/b][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30612][size=3]Glorious Daedric Retexture by [b]Gloriouz[/b][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9387][size=3]Dragon Quest 3 Sage Outfit for UNP by [b]Backsteppo[/b][/size][/url][/size]
[size=3]
Please leave a comment and endorsement
"Thank you for download"[/size]
[/font][/center][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font]
